Title: Relates to the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit; repealer
Summary: Repeals the provision of law that volunteer firefighters and ambulance workers who receive a real property tax exemption for service may not receive the income tax credit for such service.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph 2 of subsection (e-1) of section 606 of the tax law relating to the volunteer firefighters' and ambulance workers' credit
